channel.title: Youssef Ben Amara
channel.description: Recent content on Youssef Ben Amara

item.title: Price Estimation and Prediction in the Real Estate Market
item.description: -Developing scripts that allow the user to estimate or predict the price of an asset. 1-Analyze the data 2-Clean the data 3-Identify the features needed for price estimation 4-provide a predictive model for the price detection

item.title: Credit Card Default Prediction
item.description: The project is being prepared to understand whether the credit card customer will make a payment default in the next month or not based on a number of features. Data Understanding:We used an anonymized dataset of Taiwanese credit card holders from October 2006. Data comprehension and analysis (structure, size, dimensions, and relationships between various features) / Data preparation (standardisation, encoding) / Modelling and Evaluation/Deployment Link to Github Repository

item.title: Recommandation System
item.description: Create a recommandation system to help student to find an end of study internship or a first job. -Scraping linkedin profile and companies names to create a consistent database. -Analyse data -Data Cleaning -Using NLP model to predict the best recommandation to each profile -deployment of recommandation system with docker Link to Github Repository

item.title: HealthCare Web Site
item.description: Development of an application dedicated to the managment of patients in a medical practice. Using MySQL and Laravel Link to Github Repository

item.title: Kidzy Application
item.description: -Development of a dedicated application for children and parents named kidzy with 3 different version Desktop,web,mobile application based on agile SCRUM method Technologies used JavaFX,Symfony,CodenameOne,MySQL as a data base. Link to Github Repository

item.title: About Me | Achievements
item.description: What caracterizes me is creativity and organization, I have an analytical spirit data skills as well as application development.I enjoy working on sophesticated projects that require delivering key outcomes. I am excited to enter the professional world and enhance my abilities. My achievements: Certificate Neural Networks and Deep Learning 2022-09-01 Huawei Certification HCIA-AI 2022-08-01 Certificate Introduction to Machine Learning 2021-07-15 Certificate Python 2019-06-01
